vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a drainage easement from MMCW Properties, LLC, of approximately 15,211 square feet of land located near the intersection of Dolphin Road and Beall Street for the Street Group 12-630 Project - Not to exceed $15,821.00 ($12,321.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,500.00) - Financing: Street and Transportation Improvements Fund (2012 General Obligation Bond Funds)
